articles.title: Chiranjeevi says Ram Charan and Rana Daggubati would ‘sneak out of home' as kids - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Telegu actor Chiranjeevi revealed in a new video that actors Ram Charan and Rana Daggubati would sneak out of his home in childhood, roam around, and return in the morning. Ram Charan is Chiranjeevi’s son.
